basics.summary: An experienced Instructor/Writer with diverse skills including technical manuals, risk management, instruction, logistics, quality assurance and more.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Conducted student training Maintaining all airframe systems associated with the UH-60 A/L helicopter. Prepared and reviewed related lesson plans, course materials, references, training aids, briefings, slides, and presentations.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed and coordinated maintenance/production activities of 30 subordinates. Supervised and provided technical guidance to maintenance personnel performing UH-60 A/L aircraft and subsystem maintenance.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Inspected, monitored, observed and evaluated maintenance operations to ensure compliance with the latest version of maintenance manuals and ensured all documentation is thoroughly researched and accomplished.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Served as a Quality Assurance Evaluator for the Aviation Center Logistics Command supporting the Aviation Training Brigade commander's mission by acting as a liaison between the brigade and the maintenance contractor.
